name: CreateStatusPagePostmortem
description:
Create a postmortem for a status page post.

Use this tool to generate a detailed postmortem for a specific status page post using its post ID. Requires appropriate access permissions.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the resource for which the postmortem is being created.

parameters.name: status_page_post_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the status page post for which the postmortem is being created.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Status Page Post.

parameters.name: accept_header_version
parameters.description: Specify the API version using the Accept header for versioning.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: postmortem_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details about the postmortem, including type, post ID, message, and notification preference.

type.description: The type of the object returned by the API - in this case, a Status Page Post Postmortem.
A string that determines the schema of the object.

message.description: The message of the Postmortem (supports Rich-Text).

notify_subscribers.description: Whether or not subscribers of the Status Page should be notified about the Postmortem.

postmortem.description: Request to create/update a given Postmortem resource.
